net.proteusframework.cms

Interface PageElementModelFactory<PE extends PageElement>

  • Type Parameters:
    PE - the PageElement type.
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractPageElementModelFactory, BasePageElementModelFactory

    public interface PageElementModelFactory<PE extends PageElement>
    Provider of ICMSComponents.

    There should be at most one implementation registered per PageElement type. Registration is only required for PageElement types that support virtual components.

    Author:
    Russ Tennant (russ@i2rd.com)

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      PE createInstance(PageElementModel<PE> component)
      Create an instance of the specified component.
      PageElementModel<PE> getBaseComponent()
      Get the base component for the provider.
      PageElementModel<PE> getComponent(PE pageElement)
      Get the component for a PageElement instance.

      Get the PageElement type.

      Get the virtual components.

    • Method Detail

      • createInstance

        PE createInstance(PageElementModel<PE> component)
        Create an instance of the specified component.
        Parameters:
        component - the component.
        Returns:
        the PageElement instance. For backward compatibility, the PageElement shouldn't have a component identifier set if the component is a Base Component.

      • getBaseComponent

        @Nullable
PageElementModel<PE> getBaseComponent()
        Get the base component for the provider.
        Returns:
        the base component or null if this provider does not provide a base component.

      • getComponent

        PageElementModel<PE> getComponent(PE pageElement)
                                                      throws IllegalArgumentException
        Get the component for a PageElement instance.
        Parameters:
        pageElement - the page element instance.
        Returns:
        the component.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the specified page element is not supported. Implementors should not throw an exception for components that were once supported - provide for deprecation. This is intended to only throw an exception for a coding error.

      • getPageElementType

        Class<PE> getPageElementType()
        Get the PageElement type.
        Returns:
        the PageElement type.

      • getVirtualComponents

        List<PageElementModel<PE>> getVirtualComponents(CmsSite site)
        Get the virtual components.
        Parameters:
        site - the site. May be null. If null, the provider should not return any site specific components.
        Returns:
        the components.
